doc.title: Bizman Emet

credit.role: Avrutzki, IDF Chief of the General Staff

doc.plot: This unique TV drama, filmed and broadcasted live, starts with Ariel Furman, a reserve pilot in the Israeli Air Force, showing up in Jordan, en route to a supposed meeting with Hassan Nasrallah, Secretary-General of the Lebanese guerrilla group Hizballah, in Beirut. Fearing he may have been kidnapped, newly-appointed Prime Minister Nomi Fitusi must make some hard decisions, and faces pressure from the heads of the Israeli security services, especially the Mossad Deputy Director, who may has a hidden agenda. Soon, much more is on the line than Furman's life, when a Mossad team is stranded in the middle of Hizballah-controlled territory.
